Title: Foundation Tablet with Inscription of Gudea
Description: This tablet is plano-convex, and has an inscription of Gudea on two faces.
CreditLine: Museum purchase [formerly part of the Walters Collection], 1941
Provenance: Henry Walters, Baltimore, [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Sadie Jones (Mrs. Henry Walters), New York, 1931, by inheritance; Joseph Brummer, Paris and New York, 1941, by purchase [Brummer inv. no. N5010]; Walters Art Museum, 1941, by purchase.
Creator: Sumerian
